competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Major competitor in search, productivity suite, Chrome browser

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: iPhone competing with Windows Phone (Microsoft had 3.1% smartphone share)

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Primary vendor for large organizations competing with Dynamics

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Intensely competitive in enterprise software market

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Competitor in office productivity and enterprise solutions

competitors.name: Salesforce.com
competitors.notes: On-demand CRM competing with Dynamics CRM

competitors.name: Adobe
competitors.notes: Software application vendor competing with Office

context: Windows Phone 7 struggled with 3.1% market share. Google emerged as major multi-front threat. Competition shifted to cloud services and mobile platforms.
